index.hero_text: Welcome to Drekoria — a land of forgotten legends, hidden powers, and ancient ruins. Your journey begins here.

world.hero_text: Drekoria is the only known continent in its world — vast, ancient, and shaped by the rise and fall of empires. Its people believe it to be all that exists, though myths whisper of lands beyond the horizon.

characters.hero_text: Meet the key figures whose choices shape the fate of the known world.

podcast.chronicles_text: The main audio story of Drekoria. Follow the journey of Vatakh, a boy raised by the wild and shaped by the shadows of a crumbling world. An immersive tale of mystery, brotherhood, and survival.
podcast.voice_text: Historical insights and forgotten legends from Drekoria and beyond. A companion series uncovering real-world myths and fantasy lore to inspire the world behind the tale.
